statements: SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 100.00 AND quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 OR price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, shipping_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipping_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.shipping_date FROM products p JOIN shipments s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.shipping_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM shipments GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_shipments > 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity <= 5 OR product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM shipping_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM shipping_products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT warehouse_name, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, quantity, destination_address FROM shipments WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM shipping_products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM shipping_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM shipping_products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, destination_address FROM shipments WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, destination_address FROM shipments JOIN shipping_products ON shipments.product_id = shipping_products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT product_name, warehouse_name, quantity FROM products JOIN warehouses ON products.location = warehouses.location;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, warehouse_id, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM products p JOIN warehouses w ON p.location = w.location WHERE p.quantity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers
SELECT shipment_date, delivery_status FROM Shipping
SELECT * FROM Products
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_price < 500
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT shipment_date, delivery_status FROM Shipping ORDER BY shipment_date DESC
